DOC.brief_summary: The objectives of the Cartilage Repair Registry is to report the long term efficacy and safety of cartilage repair procedures in Registry patients.
DOC.brief_title: The Objectives of the Cartilage Repair Registry is to Report Long Term Efficacy and Safety of Cartilage Repair Procedures in Registry Patients
DOC.criteria: All registry patients meeting the cohort definition at the preoperative visit will be included on the overall summary tables for the patient cohort All registry patients meeting the cohort definition at the preoperative visit will be included on the overall summary tables for the patient cohort
